subject: Umpires
Officiating (Sports)
Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The umpires have botched several calls this October, including making three glaring mistakes Tuesday night in the Yankees’ 10-1 rout of the Los Angeles Angels.
snippet: The umpires have botched several calls this October, including making three glaring mistakes Tuesday night in the Yankees’ 10-1 rout of the Los Angeles Angels.
